Consumable.name: Bandages
Consumable.description: Restores a small amount of health.

Consumable.name: Attack Candy
Consumable.description: Increases attack damage for all allies.

Consumable.name: Macro Candy
Consumable.description: Increases macro damage for all allies.

Consumable.name: Reboot Disk
Consumable.description: Resurrect the target to half health.

Consumable.name: Concentrate Candy
Consumable.description: Doubles all damage dealt by the target.

Consumable.name: Medkit
Consumable.description: Restores a large amount of health.

Consumable.name: Battery
Consumable.description: Restores a small amount of stamina.

Consumable.name: Energizer
Consumable.description: Restores a large amount of stamina.
